ygData.messageBody:
Oh, well thats ok. I'm not going to say anything more, not about tinkering,
or about the third book of anything, not even my opinions. I just quit
EverQuest, so I don't care anymore. I'm sad about never being able to see
the golden age of tinkering, but maybe I'll stay subscrabed to this list to
hear about it, since I won't ever witness it first hand...*sigh* tood bad.
Oh well....good luck, hope you all master it and make all of the money off
of it before it becomes just another "blacksmithing" if you know what I
mean.

>I've read all your messages since I got on this list, and so far nothing
>you
>have stated has come from any of the game designers, programmers, or
>developers. I remember your rotten letter before you supposedly quit, I
>read
>your apology and promise to provide information in the future, and I've
>read
>you flaming other people for being down on you and I never said a thing
>about
>any of it until now...because now you are making these absolute and
>unequivocal
>statments about how there is no 3rd book etc. and I'm simply not going to
>believe it just because you say it. Nor am I going to believe it because
>you
>say that some GM says it, and the reason for that is because we have
>already
>gotten conflicting statements from GMs! One says tinkering is fine,
>another
>says it is broken, someone else says there is a 3rd book and yet another
>source
>says there isn't. I still say nothing that comes from a Guide or even a
>staff
>GM means anything...good or bad.
>If you took what I wrote as a flame maybe YOU should re-read what I wrote
>instead of automatically going into defenseive mode.
